title: Most satisfying sound in LoL.
body: Mine is hearing my {{summoner:4}} in to a {{champion:412}} wind up and hearing it land.

replies.body: Jax autoing a tower is such a beautiful thing.
the tower's screaming

lol when i first played Jax i leaned what split-pushing was because i liked hitting turrets and hearing the thunk thunk thunk thunk lol then my team was like "JAX STOP SPLIT PUSHING AND GROUP"... thats how i learned what split pushing was. True story.
my penis grows a little every time {{champion:103}} dies......
Teemo's death cry. More of a death sigh I suppose.
{{champion:99}} "UH HAHAHAHA HUHUHEEE HUH"
{{champion:34}}'s E connecting. Sounds as brutal as it is.
I forgot the pentakill announcement.

I'm not the biggest fan of the "pentakill" announcement. I prefer the Quadra.

Although I find the clink from executing a minion the most satisfying sound.
Mine is the sound of {{champion:9}} ult then a bunch of kill sounds

"You have slai—
Double Ki—
Triple—
Quadr—
Penta Kill..."

"Your team has scored an Ace."

You mean ***I*** scored an ace... Stupid announcer...
Empowered Baron Recall HANDS DOWN. Followed closely by killing the Dragon.
Mine's gotta be the sound of a talon wombo combo as he deletes his target in half a second.

{{champion:6}} laugh spam.
...What?  I play {{champion:6}}, he's one of my favorite champions!

{{champion:36}}  anything he says lolz
{{champion:86}}  Press R, EPIC
{{champion:1}}  Beaten by a little girl!
{{champion:421}}  picking Rek in champ select
{{summoner:6}}  "& he's off, like a bull with gas!"
{{summoner:2}}  I see you!
{{champion:201}}  Braum's one liners
{{champion:75}}  Q
{{champion:10}}  E
{{champion:74}}  Heimer's one liners
{{champion:20}}  Q @ a Dragon fight vs the entire enemy team, thn me dying & typing "WORTH!"
{{champion:98}}  R
{{champion:17}}  "You have slain an enemy!"(but I'm @ base shopping? ....ohhhhhhh fkn Shrooms.)
{{champion:238}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:157}}  Their deserved DEATHS.
{{champion:19}}  That WW passive that just lets me know I'm gonna die soon.
{{champion:154}}  R...R...R...R TeeHee
{{champion:36}}  Q...3secs later Q...3secs later Q...  it feels soooooooo good. {{item:3151}} 

but by far the most Satisfying sound in League has to be...{{champion:27}}  R while I Bait the entire enemy Team around the map.
"Triple Kill!(what? I didn't do anything...ohhhhhhhhhhhh that Ult'd Q hahahaha ggzzzzzzzzz)"
{{champion:41}}'s Q and crit noise. The pistol just sounds so beastly and powerful.
With a {{item:3087}}
{{champion:31}} OMNOMNOMNOMNOM when it kills an enemy
{{champion:154}} anything zac says
Attack speed TF.

I love the sound of {{champion:2}} lightning killing someone, and {{champion:64}} ultimate into a 5 man knockup

{{champion:64}} : HHEEEEE-KUUUUUUHHHHHHHHH!!!!

{{champion:157}} : SORYE GE TON!!!

{{champion:81}} : HHHUUUUUUUEEEEEERRRRR-AAAAAHHHH!!1!

{{champion:99}} : HHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!

{{champion:54}} : im going as fast as i can....-ults entire enemy team-

-PENTAKILL!!-
{{champion:103}}  death sound. She's a slut with no commitment whatsoever, that's all.
{{champion:161}}  abilities landing
Mine would be popping {{champion:99}} passive, the ting noises they make.
ludens echo after a full ap zac E. such sexy.
"Victory"
{{champion:432}}  *meep spawns* ...kazogah...
janna's death squeek, irellia's death groan and luxes death scream. rammus "ok"
I love the {{champion:9}}  sound set.

{{champion:90}} The "pong" sound that Maelific Visions makes when it jumps to a new target. Especially when it jumps through several minions in quick succession, or is followed by "Double Kill. Triple Kill" etc. My biggest problem with Snowday Malzahar is the lack of that sound.

The best sound in the game is a {{champion:122}} ult. Not the initial hit, because that may or may not kill them. I mean the little bit of rolling thunder that fades away after you kill someone with it. It's such a satisfying sound.
The sound of Anivia's E hitting a frozen target {{champion:34}}
The moan Elise sometimes makes when she reverts back to human form.
{{champion:36}} {{champion:36}}  skin's squeaky cleavers, its so much fun killing people with squeaky cleavers!
Fiddle's auto. So good.
Eternum Noct: **PIERCCCCE THE VEILL!**
You belong in a museum! {{champion:81}}
Gentlemen {{champion:31}}'s Om nom nom nom nom
{{champion:161}}'s Q

Do not kid yourselves... We all know its when {{champion:82}} ults someone... Huehuehue  

Actually my favorite sound in LoL is when Mordekaiser uses his E lol
Easy, TPA Mundo's *DOINK*, followed closely by Final Boss Veigar's sound effect when you get +1 AP.

The huehueheuhueheuehuehuehueheuheueueueheuheuheuehuehuhue of a Brazilian...
Oh wait.
we need a brazilian king mord skin, and have his laugh changed to that.

Sejuani's W, when cast.
Lissandra's laugh is another candiate.

Trynd laugh. 

And "you never stood a chance" taunt.
I've always enjoy the sound of {{champion:117}}'s W (Polymorph) connect to an enemy. It's awesome c:
The sound of Kassadin's energy sword hitting things. To me, it sounds like he's smacking and whipping things with it, like a riding crop, rather than slicing things.
The sound of {{champion:157}} finally dying after dash-dash-dash-dashing around.  Brings a smile to my face every time.
{{champion:14}}  The "DUNG!" when you ult.
